about_the_game:
Lobsterpunk is a puzzle, walking simulator where you make your way through an abandon city powered solely by the combustion of lobsters. Bring the dead machinery one last breath of life before their steel forms lay cold forever. As you do, see the memories of the last man on earth, the ones he loved, the ones he lost, & the mistakes he made to get to where he is.

Complete lockpicking puzzles to traverse this dead city, explore any house you desire, find the story of those who once lived here through what they left behind & how familiar that might feel, however foreign the setting.

Lockpicking Systems:

  • Lockpicking uses W,A,S,D to turn parts of a specialized lockpicking tool to find the sweet spot in a lock!

  • Volt Wave uses W,A,S,D toto turn parts of a specialized lockpicking tool to find a moving sweet spot on a panel!

  • Gearbox uses W,A,S,D to turn parts of a specialized lockpicking tool to find the sweet spot in a set of 3 layered gears!

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains depictions of suicide, death, and crippling loneliness.
